scripts.commit: git add -A; FILENAMES=$(git status --short | grep '^[^DR]' | awk '{for (i=2; i<=NF; i++) printf "%s%s", $i, (i==NF ? "\n" : " ")}' | while read -r file; do printf "%s%s\n" "\x22" "$(basename "$file")"; done | paste -sd ';' -); git commit -m "$(echo $FILENAMES)"
scripts.old-commit(git commit message is long wh:
git add -A; FILENAMES=`git diff --cached --name-only | while read -r file; do basename "$file"; done | tr '
' ','` && git commit -m "New - $FILENAMES";
